message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MA, cs.DS 

The paper proposes a deep reinforcement learning approach to solve the Capacitated Multi-Vehicle Routing Problem (CMVRP) with fixed fleet size. This problem involves optimizing the routing of a fleet of vehicles, which is a classic problem in operations research (cs.RO). The proposed approach uses deep learning techniques, specifically deep reinforcement learning, to solve the problem, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The approach also involves cooperative multi-agent systems, which is a subfield of multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Finally, the paper presents empirical results and comparisons with other heuristics, which involves data analysis and statistical methods, falling under the category of data science (cs.DS).
